overview: A dimly-lit evening, where the sky is painted with hues of  orange and pink as the sun sets beyond the horizon. An  unlikely encounter that sparks an unexpected connection  happens when Yna walks towards the solemnity of the  cemetery, the flicker of a candle and the fragrance of  flowers gives birth to a new connection, one that transcends  life and death. An unknowingly deep relationship was  created as Yna bought sampaguita and met Josefina. As  Josefina walks towards the cemetery clutching a well-lit  candle and creating an intimate conversation. Days  passed, and through their stories and struggles - a  connection was forged. One day, Yna goes to the  cemetery crying accompanied by Josefina as they give  their warmest comfort towards each other. As they lit  the candles in-front of the graves, a secret will unfold  and a revelation will finally be unveiled.
title: When the Sun Sets
